title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

MONDAY OCTOBER 21, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

You’re full of exciting plans but avoid getting side-tracked and confused. The more creative and disciplined you are, the better the day will be. Steer a confident course into the future of your choice.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ****

Romance is highlighted, as Venus and Neptune stimulate your partnership zone. Singles – can you distinguish between a soul mate connection and a dating disaster? Let your intuition be your guide.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ****

Clear communication and patient persistence will transform and enrich your relationships today Twins. Singles – love and work are linked, as you view a colleague or client in a romantic new light.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Close friendships are favoured today, as you find creative ways to share information with others. The more focused you are, the more other people will listen to what you are saying.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ***

When it comes to a joint financial situation, your ideas are different to those of your partner, family or bank manager. So don’t make a big decision until everyone is singing from the same song-sheet.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ****

If you take the time to communicate clearly with family and friends, then you’ll reap the rewards today Virgo. Enthusiasm is also high as you initiate a creative project or an exciting joint venture.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ****

Bring more romance and balance into your world. Your motto is from fellow Libran, actress Naomi Watts. “You have to make peace with yourself. The key is to find the harmony in what you have.”

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

You’re keen for some pure escapism. So it’s time to read a fantasy novel, listen to music or watch a Rom-Com movie. Many Scorpios are also in the mood for a candle-lit dinner or a romantic rendezvous.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

It’s a super day to nurture a romantic or business partnership. Venus encourages you to be more consultative, while Saturn urges you to accept your relationship responsibilities with a smile.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ****

A combination of hard work and creativity will take you far today Capricorn. It’s also a good day to spend quality time with your sweetheart, a trusted old confidante or a group of new friends.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

The focus is firmly on financial and business matters. But don’t put your head in the sand. You’ll find the more creatively and proactively you nurture your nest egg, the more it will gradually grow.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

Your imagination takes flight, as you dream big dreams for the future. Just make sure you actually put plans into action. Remember, there’s a fine line between creative inspiration and wishful thinking!

YOUR DAY

Make the most of today’s romantic, creative and spiritual vibes!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are an impulsive person. 2020 is the year to bring more balance, fun and friendship into your hectic life.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
